mapper.insert: insert into users(userId, userPassword, userName, userAddress, bankAccount, bankAccountAmount) values(#{userId}, #{userPassword}, #{userName}, #{userAddress}, #{bankAccount}, #{bankAccountAmount})
mapper.update: update users set userPassword = #{userPassword}, userName = #{userName}, userAddress = #{userAddress}, bankAccount = #{bankAccount}, bankAccountAmount = #{bankAccountAmount} where userNumber = #{userNumber}
